医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
增加住宅绿化的接触可能有助于延缓认知能力下降一项新研究发现，增加住宅绿化的接触可能有助于以每年八个月的速度延缓认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Increased-exposure-to-residential-greenery-may-help-stave-off-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Increased-exposure-to-residential-greenery-may-help-stave-off-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db0b039c-ae2b-443c-a8e4-6257b53b5377 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:29:12 -0400 Increased exposure to residential greenery may help stave off cognitive decline
研究发现，耳鸣与男性肥胖和身体成分有关研究发现耳鸣与身体成分之间存在显着联系，特别强调男性肥胖相关炎症的增加是一个潜在因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tinnitus-linked-to-obesity-and-body-composition-in-men-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Tinnitus-linked-to-obesity-and-body-composition-in-men-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d6f1978-b3b1-4d46-baba-210af6451002 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:00:00 -0400 Tinnitus linked to obesity and body composition in men, study finds
每天喝咖啡可降低多囊卵巢综合症风险最近的一项研究表明，每天饮用咖啡可以显着降低出现多囊卵巢综合症症状的风险。每天喝两杯咖啡的女性患 PCOS 的风险降低 70%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Drinking-coffee-daily-linked-to-decreased-PCOS-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Drinking-coffee-daily-linked-to-decreased-PCOS-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a204b468-f95f-4307-b082-d52dc8d0ee91 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Drinking coffee daily linked to decreased PCOS risk
研究人员发现一组特殊的“第一反应者”细胞对于触发血糖反应至关重要我们的身体如何如此精确地控制血糖？由德国糖尿病研究中心德累斯顿保罗朗格汉斯研究所 (PLID) 科学家领导的国际研究小组让我们离答案又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-find-a-special-group-of-first-responder-cells-crucial-for-triggering-blood-sugar-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-find-a-special-group-of-first-responder-cells-crucial-for-triggering-blood-sugar-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5db58a9b-3741-4504-a340-d4d0d52d6dbf Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:31:21 -0400 Researchers find a special group of "first responder" cells crucial for triggering blood sugar response
美国心脏协会表彰 3147 个致力于改善心血管护理的组织在美国，平均每 34 秒就有一人死于心血管疾病 (CVD)。减少心血管疾病死亡需要采取协调一致的护理方法并致力于遵循基于科学的治疗指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-3147-organizations-for-commitment-to-improving-cardioangio-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-3147-organizations-for-commitment-to-improving-cardioangio-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1977a34-bae7-44b5-87ed-166ab093cdd3 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:24:03 -0400 American Heart Association recognizes 3147 organizations for commitment to improving cardiovascular care
研究发现乳腺癌幸存者之间的遗传咨询差距由于癌症治疗和生存护理更多地依赖于了解个体肿瘤的基因组成，密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的一项新研究发现，许多符合遗传咨询和检测标准的乳腺癌幸存者并未接受遗传咨询和检测。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-finds-genic-counseling-gaps-among-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-finds-genic-counseling-gaps-among-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d5c8e52-63cc-4f58-bd30-0617b907382e Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:19:14 -0400 Study finds genetic counseling gaps among breast cancer survivors
研究人员开发了一种分析工具，可以实现无创“液体活检”活检是临床工具，常用于诊断各种疾病或监测组织的异常生长甚至移植排斥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-develop-an-analytical-tool-that-c​​ould-lead-to-lead-to-nonpressive-liquid-biopsies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Researchers-develop-an-analytical-tool-that-c​​ould-lead-to-lead-to-nonpressive-liquid-biopsies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de7e28bb-e134-4988-8c5b-8ae5f0e0eb1d Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:15:22 -0400 Researchers develop an analytical tool that could lead to lead to noninvasive "liquid biopsies"
研究确定了一种使阿片类药物更安全的新方法亚利桑那大学健康科学大学的研究人员发现了一种使阿片类药物更安全的新方法，通过热休克蛋白 90 亚型的脊髓抑制作用增强阿片类药物的止痛特性，同时减少不必要的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-identizes-a-new-way-to-make-opioids-safer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-identizes-a-new-way-to-make-opioids-safer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a27d5d4-cd22-47fa-ab8d-24c6f9376fe3 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:10:31 -0400 Study identifies a new way to make opioids safer
研究发现，短暂的轻度活动可以带来更好的睡眠长期以来，人们一直不鼓励睡前进行剧烈运动，但奥塔哥大学的研究人员发现，短暂的轻度活动可以带来更好的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Short-bursts-of-light-activity-can-lead-to-better-sleep-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Short-bursts-of-light-activity-can-lead-to-better-sleep-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f419231-0b35-45de-a729-d6457ac92279 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 14:43:05 -0400 Short bursts of light activity can lead to better sleep, study finds
胃肠炎发作后的肠易激综合症可能会持续 4 年或更长时间肠易激综合症 (IBS)——以腹痛、腹胀和排便习惯改变为特征——大约一半的受影响者在患上胃肠炎后可能会持续 4 年或更长时间，对现有证据的汇总数据分析发现，在线发表在《肠道》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/IBS-after-a-bout-of-gastroenteritis-may-last-4-or-more-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/IBS-after-a-bout-of-gastroenteritis-may-last-4-or-more-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3f27e51-8f72-41c5-b51b-75fa5dd97d17 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 14:37:10 -0400 IBS after a bout of gastroenteritis may last 4 or more years
